resources.string:
Thanks for installing MadisonDrinks!

Last updated: 2/14/2016

 MadisonDrinks was made to help you find great bar deals in downtown Madison, Wisconsin.

 I will try my best to keep this up-to-date. If something is wrong, report it. Click the 3 dots on the Action Bar and you will find my email under Help. 

 Drink Wisconsinably!

 Cheers,
 JoshRod
117 Martin Luther King Jr Blvd

How to Navigate:

The app automatically loads to the current day of the week.

 Swipe left to jump to the following day. Swipe right to jump to the previous day. You can also do this by clicking the name of the previous or following day at the top.

 Click the name of the bar to expand its specials for that specific day. Click the same bar's name to collapse it.

 Click on the blue link to find the bar in Google Maps if you're lost.

Reading Tips:

The bar specials are listed in chronological order, starting with the earliest available at the top.

 If the bar special does not have a specific time, it is *usually* safe to assume that it occurs during the bar's nighttime hours.

 Remember, the bar has the final say on what specials are available to you.

Contact Me:

Feel like this is app is missing something? Want to add a bar or fix a special?

 Just email me at: drinksmadison@gmail.com
I am no photographer, so I had to use pictures from Flickr users that captured the beauty of our city. These photographers are incredibly talented, so you should definitely check them out!\n\n

Pictures used for Monday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday were taken by Flickr user Richard Hurd.
 All pictures were resized and darkened for the purpose of this app.
 Find these, and other great pictures at:
 https://www.flickr.com/photos/rahimageworks/ 

 Picture used for Tuesday was taken by Flickr user jgagnon.
 Find his pictures at:
 https://www.flickr.com/photos/jgagnon/ 

 Picture used for Wednesday was taken by Flickr user Matt Dente.
 He also has amazing pictures at:
 https://www.flickr.com/photos/mattdente/ 

 Picture used for Sunday was taken by Flickr user Edward Stojakovic.
 Check out his cool pictures at:
 https://www.flickr.com/photos/akasped/

DISCLAIMER: MadisonDrinks DOES NOT encourage underage or excessive drinking. Bars usually change around their specials on certain days for events. Be aware that bars have the final say on what their specials are. Please drink responsibly!\n\n
MadisonDrinks, its source code, and logo, were all created and are owned by Joshua Rodriguez.
